body:
Comment 1: 
Your second 'go build' command did nothing because the output was already there and
newer than the source. The ldflags are not considered in the "do we rebuild" decision. 

If you remove the memcached output file between the two commands I believe you will see
the results you expect. Please let us know.

The second example works because you are using go build on a single source file. When
you name files on the command line, that's not an official package and it is always
rebuilt.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
